sentences.sContent: She marked a square on the blackboard.
sentences.sCn: 她在黑板上画了个正方形。

sentences.sContent: She rubbed the exercises off the blackboard after class.
sentences.sCn: 下课后她把习题从黑板上擦掉。

sentences.sContent: They realigned the desks so that they face the blackboard.
sentences.sCn: 他们将书桌重新排好使其面向黑板。

remMethod.val: black(黑色的)+board(板， 木板)→黑板

trans.tranOther: a board with a dark smooth surface, used in schools for writing on with  chalk
